recipesJson.name: Rainbow Drops
recipesJson.author: Squanderrr
recipesJson.description:
A juicy blend of candied berries with a smooth sour watermelon undertone.

I mix this at 60/40 and 2mg of nicotine. Try this mix out and let me know what you think. I am open to suggestions and tweaking this recipe. This is about the 4th version of my first layered mix and the percentages might seem a bit high to some, but given a week or two to mellow out this juice is a really sweet, satisfying vape.
